name: Alchemix (ToniOshino)
description:
The King has made his demands and he demands a fantastical magical creature! 

The two wizards must hurry back to their towers to begin their work and hopefully finish before the King gets angry!

Each player has a list of tasks they need to complete, the catch? The list is in the other
player’s room! Working together, players need to give each other the instructions in the right order to be able to complete all the tasks.

Team members:
Jamie Massella
Ren Hurley
Daniel Martinez
Katie Georgeson
Antoni Carrascosa Vallori
